<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation for recalling and prohibiting seamen from serving of forein princes and states England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ..., London : 1677/8 [i.e. 1678]
"Given at our court at Whitehall, the three and twentieth day of March, 1677/8, in the thirtieth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
=======

Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ..., London : 1677/8 [i.e. 1678]
"Given at our court at Whitehall, the three and twentieth day of March, 1677/8, in the thirtieth year of our reign." Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
